section1.title: Services
section1.description: Removes car images on the road using the deep learning technique and drone-taken images.

section1.title: CAR-free STREET MAPPING
section1.description:
Removes car images on the road using the deep learning technique 
and drone-taken images.

section2.title: 3D MODELING
section2.description:
Creates 2.5D to 3D models from the drone-taken images using the 
multi-directional cameras.

section3.title: HD SAFETY MAP
section3.description: Creates simulation data for autonomous vehicles by gathering road information such as crosswalk, center line, and stop lines from real drone-taken images.

section4.title: AUTOMATIC DATA PROCESSING
section4.description: Distributes data processing step using the Node to automate the processing.

section2.title: Car-free Street Map
section2.description:
Deep Learning and Drone-based Automated Image 
Removal Solution for Vehicles on the Road
section2.description2: An innovative service that will replace the traditional road monitoring system.

section1.title: Capture
section1.description:
Capture enough data to create 
a dataset using the drone. 
The data type must be in image format.

section2.title: Combine
section2.description:
Combine the tile dataset into
one whole road  image 
for the preparation of data processing.

section3.title: process
section3.description:
Process the dataset through CfSM solution to get rid of car/shadow images from the road. 
The successful result would have a clear road without any distortion.

section4.title: monitor
section4.description:
Monitor the status of the road using 
CfSM processed image. 
Detect the condition of the road by running an analysis on the server.

section1.title: DaaS Pano (360°)
section1.description:
Seoul Worldcup Stadium, Park
and Yongwol City

section3.description:
This is a panorama created using DasS Pano in collaboration with the Seoul Metropolitan Government. 
 Experience the Seoul World Cup Stadium, World Cup Park vividly
and Yeongwol City

section1.description:
This is a 3D sample shown using DroMii's own technology. 
 We show various renderings depending on the options. 
 Depending on the sample, some options may be disabled.

section2.description:
Images taken by drones are reconstructed 
 and displayed in 3D.
section2.description2:
Removes vehicle visibility to reveal the full picture 
 of the road.

section1.description:
Based on CfSM, it removes cars using deep learning algorithms,
and those integrated images are combined to make car-free street maps.
Also, it could be used for self-driving car simulation data
with the real road information and HD Safety Map.

Makes HTML5-based results from several images going through 360° Panoramic platform and a real-time auto-process (with mosaic and color correction process, etc.), which automatically sends the result to users in any OS & device.
